verbose_text: In an attempt to elucidate whether the knockdown of ANX A1 mediated inhibition of BM-MSC osteogenic differentiation involves the activation of p38 MAPK, the status of p38 phosphorylation during the course of differentiation of BM-MSCs into osteoblasts was analyzed.
evidence: ANX A1-mediated inhibition of BM-MSC osteogenic differentiation involves the activation of p38 MAPK
